about_the_game:
Enjoy Septerra's world apart from visuals with the Official Game Soundtrack!

Soundtrack composed and performed by Martin O’Donnell. Digitally remastered by Goran Bastinac. Published by TopWare Interactive.

PLAYLIST


  • 01. Legacy of the Creator -- [01:29]
  • 02. Septerras Ambient -- [05:54]
  • 03. The Chosen Ruins -- [05:59]
  • 04. Shell One -- [01:15]
  • 05. Shell Two -- [00:45]
  • 06. Shell Three -- [00:54]
  • 07. Shell Four -- [02:06]
  • 08. Shell Five -- [01:39]
  • 09. Shell Six -- [01:25]
  • 10. Shell Seven -- [01:40]
  • 11. Battletrack 1 -- [01:45]
  • 12. Battletrack 2 -- [01:28]
  • 13. Battletrack 3 -- [01:08]
  • 14. Battletrack 4 -- [01:50]
  • 15. Battletrack 5 -- [01:22]
  • 16. Battletrack 6 -- [01:26]
  • 17. Septerra Menu Theme -- [03:10]

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any, supported by OS
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any, supported by OS

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Mac Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics supported by OS
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any, supported by OS
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Mac Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics supported by OS
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any, supported by OS

name: Septerra Core - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Single Core CPU @ 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Enjoy Septerra's world apart from visuals with the Official Game Soundtrack! Soundtrack composed and performed by Martin O’Donnell. Digitally remastered by Goran Bastinac. Published by TopWare Interactive.
